title: Number 13 not a favorite of ballplayers
subtitle: Number 13 not a favorite of ballplayers
body: You're on Jeopardy, choose the category "Phobias for $200," Alex Trebek says, "Triskaidekaphobia," and you answer:  "What is the term for something Major League ballplayers dread more than being jammed by a 95-mile fastball in 40-degree weather?"  Your bankroll grows and you get to pick again. Tom Singer is a national reporter for MLB.com. Follow @Tom_Singer on Twitter. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Tom Singer
